channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Francis, JD Vance, and the Evening Rain
item.description: The Covid lesson we cannot afford to forget.

item.title: A Bad Game of Legal Twister Won’t Block Ohio’s SAFE Act
item.description: A state appellate court twisted itself into knots to prevent the state’s law restricting medicalized gender transition for minors.

item.title: Yes, It’s Completely Constitutional For The U.S. Government To Promote Christianity
item.description: The states pushing legislation to display the Ten Commandments in public schools are all but guaranteed to end up at the Supreme Court.

item.title: Lawfare Is a Catastrophe
item.description: It has to be opposed.

item.title: Where Do You Draw the Line?
item.description: While I concede the legality of the administration’s move against Rumeysa Öztürk, I reject its morality and prudence.

item.title: Rep. Thomas Massie: Only Trump can decide Speaker Johnson's fate

item.title: Racial Grievance Theater Is About Humiliation, Not History
item.description: Americans should be wary of all historical and political narratives that leverage racial grievance and victimhood.
